Bismillah Meaning: With the name of Allah, the extremely loving and caring right now, the always loving and caring
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 1 Meaning: All praise and thanks is for Allah, The Master of all nations and people
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 2 Meaning: The extremely loving and caring right now, the always loving and caring
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 3 Meaning: The Master of the day of judgment
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 4 Meaning: You alone we worship and You alone we ask for help
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 5 Meaning: Guide us to the upright straight path
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 6 Meaning: The path of those whom You have favored
Surah Al Fatihah Ayah 7 Meaning: But the path of those who have wrath upon them, nor those who are lost
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 2: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلْكِتَـٰبُ لَا رَيْبَ ۛ فِيهِ ۛ هُدًۭى لِّلْمُتَّقِينَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 2 Meaning: That is the book! No Doubt! In it is an amazing guidance for the cautious.
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 3: ٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِٱلْغَيْبِ وَيُقِيمُونَ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَمِمَّا رَزَقْنَـٰهُمْ يُنفِقُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 3 Meaning: Those who believe in the unseen, establish salah, and only out of what We have provided them they spend
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 4: وَٱلَّذِينَ يُؤْمِنُونَ بِمَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيْكَ وَمَآ أُنزِلَ مِن قَبْلِكَ وَبِٱلْـَٔاخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 4 Meaning: And those who believe in what was sent to you and what was sent from much before you and in the hereafter they have absolute conviction
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 5: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ عَلَىٰ هُدًۭى مِّن رَّبِّهِمْ ۖ وَأُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْلِحُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 5 Meaning: Those people are committed to guidance from their Master and those people are the reapers of success
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 6: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا۟ سَوَآءٌ عَلَيْهِمْ ءَأَنذَرْتَهُمْ أَمْ لَمْ تُنذِرْهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 6 Meaning: Indeed as for those who disbelieve it is all the same for them whether you warn them or do not warn them they will never believe
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 7: خَتَمَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِمْ وَعَلَىٰ سَمْعِهِمْ ۖ وَعَلَىٰٓ أَبْصَـٰرِهِمْ غِشَـٰوَةٌۭ ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٌۭ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 7 Meaning: Allah has completely sealed their hearts and their hearing and even over their eyes is a covering and for them is a great punishment
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 8: وَمِنَ ٱلنَّاسِ مَن يَقُولُ ءَامَنَّا بِٱللَّهِ وَبِٱلْيَوْمِ ٱلْـَٔاخِرِ وَمَا هُم بِمُؤْمِنِينَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 8 Meaning: And from among the people there is someone who says we believe in Allah and even in the last day. No! They are not believers at all!
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 9: يُخَـٰدِعُونَ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَمَا يَخْدَعُونَ إِلَّآ أَنفُسَهُمْ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 9 Meaning: They try to deceive Allah and the believers. They do not deceive anyone except themselves. They have no realization at all!
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 10: فِى قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌۭ فَزَادَهُمُ ٱللَّهُ مَرَضًۭا ۖ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابٌ أَلِيمٌۢ بِمَا كَانُوا۟ يَكْذِبُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 10 Meaning: There is a disease in their hearts. Then Allah has increased them in sickness. They have a constantly painful punishment because they habitually used to lie.
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 11: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ لَا تُفْسِدُوا۟ فِى ٱلْأَرْضِ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُصْلِحُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 11 Meaning: And when it is said to them do not cause corruption on the earth they say we are only peacemakers
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 12: أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلْمُفْسِدُونَ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا يَشْعُرُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 12 Meaning: Listen up! It is they who are the cause of corruption and they have no realization at all!
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 13: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمْ ءَامِنُوا۟ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلنَّاسُ قَالُوٓا۟ أَنُؤْمِنُ كَمَآ ءَامَنَ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ ۗ أَلَآ إِنَّهُمْ هُمُ ٱلسُّفَهَآءُ وَلَـٰكِن لَّا يَعْلَمُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 13 Meaning: And when it is said to them believe as the people have they say should we believe as the fools have Listen up! it is they who are the fools and they know it not
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 14: وَإِذَا لَقُوا۟ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ قَالُوٓا۟ ءَامَنَّا وَإِذَا خَلَوْا۟ إِلَىٰ شَيَـٰطِينِهِمْ قَالُوٓا۟ إِنَّا مَعَكُمْ إِنَّمَا نَحْنُ مُسْتَهْزِءُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 14 Meaning: And when they are with the believers they say we believe but when they are alone with their devils they say we are with you we were only mocking them
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 15: ٱللَّهُ يَسْتَهْزِئُ بِهِمْ وَيَمُدُّهُمْ فِى طُغْيَـٰنِهِمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 15 Meaning: Allah throws their mockery at them and prolongs them in their transgression as they wander blindly
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 16: أُو۟لَـٰٓئِكَ ٱلَّذِينَ ٱشْتَرَوُا۟ ٱلضَّلَـٰلَةَ بِٱلْهُدَىٰ فَمَا رَبِحَت تِّجَـٰرَتُهُمْ وَمَا كَانُوا۟ مُهْتَدِينَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 16 Meaning: Those are the ones who have purchased misguidance at the cost of guidance their trade did not produce any profit and they were never committed to guidance at all
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 17: مَثَلُهُمْ كَمَثَلِ ٱلَّذِى ٱسْتَوْقَدَ نَارًۭا فَلَمَّآ أَضَآءَتْ مَا حَوْلَهُۥ ذَهَبَ ٱللَّهُ بِنُورِهِمْ وَتَرَكَهُمْ فِى ظُلُمَـٰتٍۢ لَّا يُبْصِرُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 17 Meaning: Their example is something like the example of someone who tried to light a fire but when it illuminated everything that was around him Allah took away their light abd left them in darkness so they could not see
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 18: صُمٌّۢ بُكْمٌ عُمْىٌۭ فَهُمْ لَا يَرْجِعُونَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 18 Meaning: Deaf! Mute! Blind! So they will not return
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 19: أَوْ كَصَيِّبٍۢ مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ فِيهِ ظُلُمَـٰتٌۭ وَرَعْدٌۭ وَبَرْقٌۭ يَجْعَلُونَ أَصَـٰبِعَهُمْ فِىٓ ءَاذَانِهِم مِّنَ ٱلصَّوَٰعِقِ حَذَرَ ٱلْمَوْتِ ۚ وَٱللَّهُ مُحِيطٌۢ بِٱلْكَـٰفِرِينَ
Surah Al Baqarah Ayah 19 Meaning: Or it is like a rainstorm from the sky in which there is heavy clouds darkness thunder and lightening they put their fingers in their esrs against the thunderclaps for fear of death and Allah is encompassing of the disbelievers
